channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel -- McAfee Security Scan+ (MSS+)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel -- McAfee Security Scan+ (MSS+)

item.title: CVE-2015-8991|2024-08-06T08:36:31.656Z -- intel -- mcafee%20security%20scan%2B%20%28mss%2B%29
item.description: Malicious file execution vulnerability in Intel Security McAfee Security Scan+ (MSS+) before 3.11.266.3 allows attackers to make the product momentarily vulnerable via executing preexisting specifically crafted malware during installation or uninstallation, but not during normal operation.
